title: Rating algorithm should give more weight to recent reviews
body: It would be nice if more recent reviews would have more weight in the total score of the app. If you are unlucky, you might have a bad release or two early on in the lifecycle of the app and receive many 1:s before you can fix the problem. These low scores will drag down your average for a long time. The potential downloader is interested in what the app is like *now*, right?

comments.body: We can only see the last 12m reviews in the Dashboard, but the store lists and counts reviews going back to launch (have some negative ones from 2012)
